GSD.description:
ALSA: timer: Use deferred fasync helper

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit 409e6a79928349d5aa702f655a572ac63c7f17ff. For more details please see the references link.
